title: 43 RP for The Dungeon Quest <33
body:
I have 43 RP at the moment, and have 10$ I plan on purchasing RP with, so I can get the quest upgrade (Dungeon Pass). Can you guys help me out with the 43 RP if I purchase the 10$ worth please!!!!???!?!!? I'l draw a picture or you guys can change out my 49K ip for just a tiny little 43 rp? Please respond either way. I love you guys! keep up the good work!

Just instruct me to draw, or put a shoe on my head and it will be done. I'll even offer one karaoke song if need be. I want to participate fully in this event and a measly 43 RP is all that is in my way. Please Rito :[[ turn my frown upside down :]].

I'm heading to go purchase the 10$ card, Rito won kenobi your my only hope.

replies.body:
http://i.giphy.com/QwH7v7J1tBrq0.gif

Only 43 RP away from the pass?! Wow that would feel pretty bad knowing you'd have to spend a lot more just for a measly 43 RP. 

Tell ya what, go ahead and shoot me a drawing of an *arcade* poro, and add the rest of that RP to your account. Once I've got that picture and you have the other $10 you needed, I should be able to get this done for ya!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Ayyyyy dat's a nice Lee Sin! It looks like one of our agents was already able to get that RP added for you in a ticket, sorry I was so slow DX!!

No worries man, Thanks alot to you for being a real Broporo, and thanks to the tier 2 or 3 Customer service employee who sorted me out. Feel free to use the Picture I made for worlds, or any other comerical event!
Oh trust, I'll be holding onto this one xD!

[IMG]http://i67.tinypic.com/2quuddx.png[/IMG]

Boom!, I hope this is sufficent
